trans-unit.source: Associates a key string with <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"></xref> values to define <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Associa uma cadeia de chave com <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue"> </xref> valores definir <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The basic unit of semantic expression in System.Speech is the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, which is a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: A unidade básica de expressão semântica no System.Speech é o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>, que é um par chave/valor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: Using SemanticResultKey objects, you tag <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instances contained in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects and strings so that the values may readily be accessed from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> instances on recognition.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar objetos de SemanticResultKey, marcar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>instâncias contidas no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objetos e cadeias para que os valores prontamente podem ser acedidos a partir <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>instâncias no reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and SemanticResultKey objects, in conjunction with <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects, to define the semantic structure for a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>e SemanticResultKey objetos, juntamente com <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objetos, para definir a estrutura de semântica para uma gramática de reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: To access the semantic information in a recognition result, obtain an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> through the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.
trans-unit.target: Para aceder às informações semânticos num resultado de reconhecimento, obter uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>através da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and SemanticResultKey objects, see [Understanding SemanticResultValue and SemanticResultKey Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) and [Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>e objetos SemanticResultKey, consulte [SemanticResultValue compreender e objetos SemanticResultKey](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c) e [utilizando um SemanticResultKey para extrair uma SemanticResultValue](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/198e29b8-845f-4cec-a25e-f55c0eaf46aa) no [guia de programação de reconhecimento de voz sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: Assigns a semantic key to one or more <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects used to create a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Atribui uma chave semântica para um ou mais <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objetos utilizados para criar uma gramática de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Because of implicit conversions, the `builders` argument supports <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, and <xref:System.String> objects as well.
trans-unit.target: Devido às conversões implícitas, o `builders` argumento suporta <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, e <xref:System.String>, bem como objetos.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: For more information on implicit conversions, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre conversões implícitas, consulte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>

trans-unit.source: When performing a recognition operation, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects provided in the `builders` argument are treated as sequential.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar uma operação de reconhecimento, os <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objetos fornecidos a `builders` argumento são tratadas como sequenciais.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> is used to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, input to the recognition engine must contain the words "the quick brown fox" in sequence to be recognized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o seguinte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>é utilizado para construir uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, entrada para o motor de reconhecimento tem de conter as palavras "a rápida raposa castanha" na sequência a reconhecido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey( "stringTest", new GrammarBuilder[] { new GrammarBuilder("the"), new GrammarBuilder("quick"), new GrammarBuilder("brown"), new GrammarBuilder("fox")}); ``` The `semanticResultKey` argument contains the tag used to access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> which might be returned.
trans-unit.target: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey( "stringTest", new GrammarBuilder[] { new GrammarBuilder("the"), new GrammarBuilder("quick"), new GrammarBuilder("brown"), new GrammarBuilder("fox")}); ```O `semanticResultKey` argumento contém a tag utilizada para acesso a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>que poderá ser devolvido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> is determined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instances provided by the `builders` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>é determinado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>instâncias fornecidas pelo `builders` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects contain no defining instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>Objetos não conter nenhuma instância de definição de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, o valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>é `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects provided in the `builders` parameter provide an untagged (not associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> object) <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instance that is used by the recognition logic, that instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> will define the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> that is produced.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objetos fornecidos no `builders` parâmetro fornecer um requeira (não associados a um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objeto) <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>instância que é utilizada pela lógica de reconhecimento, essa instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>irá definir o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>que é produzida.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: There should be one, and only one, untagged <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> instance in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects specified by the `builders` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Deve existir um e apenas um não marcado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>instância no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objetos especificados pelo `builders` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: If multiple instances of untagged <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> are associated with the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, each will attempt to the set the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> produced in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Se várias instâncias não marcado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>estão associados a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, cada um irá tentar o conjunto de valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>produzidos no resultado de reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: This is not permitted, and the recognizer will generate an exception when it attempts to use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> created using such a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instance.
trans-unit.target: Não é permitido e o reconhecedor irá gerar uma exceção ao tentar utilizar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>criadas a utilizar como um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> contained in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects specified by the `builders` parameter and already associated with another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> have no effect on the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instance.
trans-unit.target: Instâncias de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>contidas no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objetos especificados pelo `builders` parâmetro e já associada ao outro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>não tem qualquer efeito sobre os atuais <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: The tag to be used as a semantic key to access the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects specified by the `builders` argument.
trans-unit.target: Na etiqueta para ser utilizado como uma chave semântica para aceder a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> instância associada a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objetos especificados pelo `builders` argumento.

trans-unit.source: An array of grammar components that will be associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> object accessible with the tag defined in `semanticResultKey`.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz dos componentes de gramática que será associado um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> acessível com a etiqueta definida no objecto `semanticResultKey`.

trans-unit.source: Assigns a semantic key to one or more <xref:System.String> instances used to create a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Atribui uma chave semântica para um ou mais <xref:System.String>instâncias utilizadas para criar uma gramática de reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When performing a recognition operation, the <xref:System.String> objects used in the `phrases` parameter are treated as sequential.
trans-unit.target: Quando efetuar uma operação de reconhecimento, os <xref:System.String>objetos utilizados no `phrases` parâmetro são tratadas como sequenciais.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the following <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> is used to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, input to the recognition engine must contain the words "the quick brown fox" in sequence to be recognized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o seguinte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>é utilizado para construir uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>, entrada para o motor de reconhecimento tem de conter as palavras "a rápida raposa castanha" na sequência a reconhecido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>

trans-unit.source: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey("stringTest", new string[] { "the", "quick", "brown", "fox"}); ``` The `semanticResultKey` argument determines the key used to access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> which might be returned.
trans-unit.target: ```c# SemanticResultKey stringTest=new SemanticResultKey("stringTest", new string[] { "the", "quick", "brown", "fox"}); ```O `semanticResultKey` argumento determina a chave utilizada para aceder a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>que poderá ser devolvido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>

trans-unit.source: If you construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object that contains a semantic key with an array of string objects, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> produced by a recognition operation will be the string used in recognition.
trans-unit.target: Se lhe construir uma <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>utilizando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objeto que contém uma chave semântica com uma matriz de objetos de cadeia, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>produzidos por uma operação de reconhecimento será a cadeia utilizada no reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: In the preceding example, this means that <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> would be "the quick brown fox".
trans-unit.target: No exemplo anterior, isto significa que <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>seria "a rápida raposa castanha".</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tag to be used access the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> instance associated with the <xref:System.String>objects specified by the `phrases` argument.
trans-unit.target: Na etiqueta para ser utilizado o acesso a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> instância associada a <xref:System.String>objetos especificados pelo `phrases` argumento.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.String> objects, whose concatenated text will be associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"></xref> object accessible with the tag defined in `semanticResultKey`.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais <xref:System.String>objetos, cujo texto concatenado será associado um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue"> </xref> acessível com a etiqueta definida no objecto `semanticResultKey`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> construídas a partir de atual <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The use of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A> is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> constructor which takes <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> as an argument (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>).
trans-unit.target: A utilização de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A>é equivalente ao utilizar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>construtor que aceite <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>como um argumento (<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>).</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue.ToGrammarBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> constructed from the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma instância de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> construídas a partir de atual <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey"> </xref> instância.
